com.android.slackandhay.input
Class InputSystem

java.lang.Object
  com.android.slackandhay.input.InputSystem

public class InputSystem
extends java.lang.Object

this class represents the input system in which all inputs (e.g. touch screens, d pads, keyboards and so on) are gathered and interpreted also all the input bindings are placed here

Author:
Tilman BÃ¶rner, Jan Rabe & Tom Wallroth

getLeftTouchOffset

public Point getLeftTouchOffset()
Returns the offset of the finger position since the last time it was requested: please note: once it has been requested the values will be lost, so save them!

Returns:
a point containing a offset.

getRightTouchOffset

public Point getRightTouchOffset()
Returns the offset of the finger position since the last time it was requested: please note: once it has been requested the values will be lost, so save them!

Returns:
a point containing a offset.
